Html:
Hi Kendal, This is great work that you've done and shared. Thanks!
By chance, do you plan on adding a feature to pull the extended properties of database objects? At least at the Database level to add a description about the purpose of each database. For example, I would add in extended properties myself or use Data Dictionary Creator to add properties and then use your tool to do an inventory that would include the properties to better describe databases and objects.

Thanks,
Darren

Hi Kendal
Great work!
I would also like support for pulling the extended properties of database objects. This would be helpful in creating documentation for the schema - what the columns in a table mean etc. Was this idea rejected for any specific reason?

-Rajesh.
